articles.title: Webb detects complex organic molecules in distant early Universe - Sky at Night Magazine
articles.description: Astronomers used James Webb Space Telescope to detect the oldest most distant complex organic molecules ever discovered in galaxy SPT0418-47.
articles.content:
Early in 2023, a team of astronomers used the James Webb Space Telescope to detect the oldest and most distant complex organic molecules ever discovered.
